## SomePHPStanRule

:wrench: **configure it!**

- class: `Symplify\RuleDocGenerator\Tests\DirectoryToMarkdownPrinter\Fixture\PHPStan\Configurable\SomePHPStanRule`

```yaml
services:
    -
        class: Symplify\RuleDocGenerator\Tests\DirectoryToMarkdownPrinter\Fixture\PHPStan\Configurable\SomePHPStanRule
        tags: [phpstan.rules.rule]
        arguments:
            someValue: 10
```
